2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: REAL WEST continues with a never-before-published story from the classic western strip LATIGO by legendary cartoonist Stan Lynde: THE WHITE BUFFALO!

In this one shot comic from the full EC Library book, Came the Dawn, Wally Wood illustrates a fantastic Al Feldstein classic comic. The train whistle pierces the night as a stranger steps onto the platform, bag in hand. The town is crawling with trigger-happy locals looking for a murderer, someone who is a stranger to them and this new man has the entire town in a tizzy. Liked this story and want some more? Grab another 99 cent Wallace Wood comic or get the entire Came the Dawn collection today!
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: The Confidant

volume.name: Came the Dawn and Other Stories

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: The Rogues continue their flight from the ruthless Crime Syndicate, who have put a bounty on their heads. But en route back to Central City, Mirror Master’s powers malfunction, and they land in the middle of the events of ARKHAM WAR with pretty much every Bat-villain around going after the bounty!
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Dark Night

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: All blood spilled into the earth makes its way to a river. Where those rivers meet, Fox attends the birth of a beast, the child of a thousand violent deaths.

While Clev investigates whether teleporting man in black Terminus is friend or foe, controversy rages over a scientist’s promise to grant superpowers to private citizens he deems worthy. And when an attempt at crime fighting by one of the newly empowered goes explosively wrong, of course Clev’s caught in the middle!

The acclaimed series is back with a vengeance!

From Dan Jolley (Prototype 2) and Leonard Kirk (X-Factor)!
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Part Three

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
The Secular Humanist Occult Obliteration Taskforce faces off against a forest full of fairies, elves, and magical creatures . . . without their guns! Secrets are revealed, dragons are wrestled, and the stage is set for the shocking final confrontation! Don’t miss the series the NY Post calls “hotly anticipated”!

Original, irreverent, and controversial!

Aclin and Selma are the next “it” team in creator-owned comics!
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Part Three: The Folklorics

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
Unrest flares in Old Mexico. Revolution is in the air, and the Sisters of the White Rose are fanning the flames, seizing control of the capital and placing the corrupt governor on trial for his crimes against his own citizens. But as the rebellion swells, the governor's masters have plans of their own. Gunmen, bent on killing the Sisters and Lady Rawhide, are on the move. There are killers a-plenty, all with shifting allegiances, with Lady Rawhide caught in the middle of a maelstrom of death and treachery...

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: The conclusion to the year-long event celebrating the 50th Anniversary of Doctor Who! The 9th through 11th Doctors are showcased in a story leading up to the final issue with all 11 Doctors.

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
Jack's travels bring him to a village filled with tension and mystery. Can he discover the town's strange secret before Aku's robotic army invades? Our samurai hero's quest to gather the Threads of Time continues.

RegRegular CoverAndy Suriano1
SubSubscription CoverGenndy Tartakovsky2

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
When her life comes crashing down on her-literally-Trish discovers she is more alone than she ever could have anticipated! After the startling revelation at the conclusion of last issue, Trish must now deal with a devastating tidal wave that threatens to destroy what little remains in her life, as well as an even more shocking discovery that she may indeed be the cause of everything terrible that is happening to her! Aspen's own Vince Hernandez is joined by the artistic talents of Giuseppe Cafaro and Andrea Dotta to bring to you Aspen's newest hit series, TRISH OUT OF WATER!

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: Where do you go when there is nowhere left to run? Back to the beginning! Tired of fleeing from Wonderland, Calie and Violet begin to search for answers by delving into Charles Dodsgon's past. But a mysterious force from Wonderland might have other, darker plans in mind for them.
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Volume Three

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
Hoping to prove his loyalty and thereby gain entrance to Caterpillar Alley so as to continue his quest to kill the White Rabbit, Alice submits to accompanying the Queen of Hearts as the monarch of Wonderland tours the realm and keeps the peace. But when the Queen turns his scythe on three young children who are guilty of disobeying royal orders, Alice instinctively steps in. By defying the Queen, will Alice lose his chance to become the real Alice in Wonderland…and lose his head as well?!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 15: Crumble Like Cookies.
  • Chapter 16: Be Lost in Reverie
  • Chapter 17: Fraidycat.
  • Special: Are You Mania?

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: As her teammates look on in horror, Niko succumbs to the taint that has overwhelmed her soul gem and she transforms into a terrifying witch. But there is little time for the Pleiades Saints to grieve-this new witch has gone on the attack! Left with no alternative, Mirai strikes down her friend to save the rest of the girls. Is there any power that can save the Magical Girls from their fate?
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Vol. 3

volume.name: Puella Magi Kazumi Magica: The Innocent Malice

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: The third and final volume with the work of the master of the pinup, Aslan, with a booklet of 'forbidden' patterns. In this third volume, you will find a selection of 'girls pin' in color, made for him and other journals, but also work with graphite Aslan began in the middle 1980s and that he continues to perform. These works reflect the incessant painter but also a sculptor, led his life on the female body searches.
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Book 3

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: With Team Carnacki prisoners of an old foe, and Team Challenger under attack from an ancient Cyclopean behemoth, things can't get worse, or can they?

Jesse vs. Merc! Everyone's favorite septugenarian squares off against everyone's favorite Sasquatch in a vicious rooftop battle. Plus: Norma heads home, where she encounters mysterious news and unexpected advice.

Elliot is kidnapped and Dapple’s sinister plan is in full effect. With imaginary friends from all around the world gathering together, mankind may finally lose the upper hand. IMAGINE agents, Terry and Dave, may not have the wits to save the day, but with the help of Elliot’s mother and imaginary friend, they may just have a chance.

The D'Ent Lieutenant responds in kind and overwhelms the police, but before Dart can try to end the massacre, Shard informs him the D'Ent invasion is imminent.
Revenge is upon us at last, and it will not end well.
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Vol. 3

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: A mechanical Fortune Teller recounts a tale of a wanderer who has the uncanny ability to speak to animals. Encountering a traveling Carnival, he is taken in under the Magician's wing and also meets a beautiful horse rider. Secrets, love, deception, and wonder abound as the formation of the first Ringmaster is revealed.
From the famed tales of 1001 Nights, Keeping Up With The Jinns features two genies that go to battle trying to resolve a conflict dating back over 2,000 years!
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Keeping Up With the Jinns

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: Amber and Zavi break into the lab to grow The Endling a body, but their pursuers are closing in.

Ivan the Terrible grew Moscow from a medieval nation state to an empire, but he had help. The machinations he used were terrible to behold, as he made a deal with Beelzebub. Kade has been working both sides of this nightmare, except instead of these two being at odds, they are in theory both allies, with each is trying to get the upper hand on the other. Beelzebub hasn't recognized Kade as the Demon Hunter, but when he begins to realize that Kade will rise to a higher level of power, he plots Kade's assassination.
Translate : Avengers (2013) #05-06 , New Avengers (2013) #03
Translate : Uncanny Avengers (2012) #03 , Avengers Arena (2013) #03 , Avengers Assemble(2012) #11

Les Damnés du Reich - inclus un cahier historique

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
Talented but aimless Sakurai just can't find a place to belong. After trying (and failing) one extracurricular activity after another, his life changes thanks to a chance encounter with lacrosse fanatic Toyoguchi, who thinks Sakurai has just what it takes to propel her girls lacross team to victory!

After tons of hard work, sweat, and tears, the team enters their first tournament. But if they want to be challengers, they'll have to up their fame both on and off the field-not only does goalie Komatsu need one-on-one top training, but she and the team's top players need to bring their grades up. And if they do advance, they'll have to face the league's toughest team-Choran.

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.deck: Is that the power of  Chevalier Sage? The mystery of Sage.

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: The Scribblenauts gang travels to Metropolis where they find a mob of anti-Superman protesters led by--Lois Lane and Jimmy Olsen?! The Man of Steel himself has no idea why his best pals have turned against him...so it's up to Maxwell and Lily to solve this puzzle!
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: The City That Hated Superman

volume.name: Scribblenauts Unmasked: A Crisis of Imagination

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
This issue introduces the new series Dororo! Hyakkimaru is an empty man, in quite a literal sense. He has no eyes, no ears, and instead of arms he has two swords attached to his shoulders. On a whim, he saves a young thief named Dororo from a group of ruffians. However, instead of receiving undying gratitude from the young boy, he gets a declaration threatening his sword! Also included are the continuations of Astro Boy and Black Jack.

Story Titles

  • Astro Boy: The Greatest Robot On Earth Chapter Three
  • Dororo: Hyakkimaru
  • Black Jack: Teratoid Cystoma
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Vol. 3

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: Cuba, 1902. Freed from its Spanish masters by US forces four years ago, the island is still occupied by its erstwhile liberators, some of whom aren’t all that eager to leave. American businessmen and politicians would like to see Cuba become a full state, while the Cuban people dream only of freedom. When people begin dying... and then come back to life, the SPOOKS are sent to investigate the possible involvement of a Cuban priest and rebel leader—a santero.
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: El Santero
Une pour tous et tous pour elle

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: The enemy is still not defeated and Lambiks final minutes are ticking away. But are friends do not despair. Together they face one of their greatest challenges to save Lambik: they enter the Labyrinth of the Lion.
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: De Verboden Tempel

volume.name: Suske en Wiske: Het Labyrint van de Leeuw

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: Michael and Tabitha battle the mercenaries, hoping to give Katherine time to upload the core of the Rider technology into Michael’s car. The mercs have other ideas, involving lots and lots of explosives. Boom!

Hawke, Santini and Trinidad arrive in the Middle East to link up with Hawke’s old friend Abdul Shahid who has figured out where Dr. Moffit is hiding. Unfortunately for Shahid, Moffit is on to him and sends his henchmen to silence him forever and their weapon of choice is Airwolf!

When Fuyumi is captured, Staz and the others split up to try to locate the missing girl. Bell's space-bending spying, Liz's crystal ball, and Staz's old-fashioned detective work lead them to their culprit: Bell's younger brother?! Like his sister, Knell has dimension-warping abilities, which allowed him to sneak Fuyumi away right from under her protector's nose. Caught between family and friends, will Bell help Fuyumi return to Staz, or will she plant herself firmly between them?!

  • Chapter 14 ♠ Wolf Doesn't Half-Ass It

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: Claire discovers what Victor's plot is and sets out to stop him not realizing that Victor is more clever and manipulative than ever!
Translates Batman & Robin Annual #1 & Batman & Robin #13-16.
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Jokers Todesspiel

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: Translates : Uncanny Avengers (2013) #03

The adventure in Howard Chaykin's new ground-breaking tale of the new Buck Rogers continues! Buck Rogers, former World War I ace is accidentally suspended in time only to awaken to a new and different earth, 500 years in the future, fragmented by war and ruled by an omnipotent force- the Chinese. Now, Buck along with Colonel Wilma Deering, begin a new fight, to free the United States! Buck Rogers, the most famous 'man out of his time' comes closer to his destiny; will he succeed in freeing what is left of the United States from the domination of an occupying force? Unexpected surprises and plot twist dominate as the story arc races forward.

Aiden battles it out with the powerful Mecha Eel while a mysterious man from his past observes his every move. Meanwhile Bolt Mighty attempts to deal with no longer being the only super hero in town and he's not taking things well at all!
Part 2 of The Chosen. The after effects of the Event begin to come to light, as a group prepared for the end of days are hit by a meteor fragment.

Action-packed political satire in a post-apocalyptic Western setting, the Jeremiah stories have been worldwide bestsellers since their introduction in the 1980s. Featuring dazzlingly detailed and kinetic artwork from Hermann, a master of European graphics storytelling, the third Jeremiah Omnibus presents tales of blood, vengeance, and the enduring power of friendship.

Jeremiah has sold millions of copies and been translated into 24 languages!

Third omnibus volume from Dark Horse and Strip Arts Features!

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
Life for Souichiro Hino and Itsuki Aoyama and their Love Club aka Ghostbusters should be getting easier. The club finally have a teacher adviser who won't run screaming into the night. They've even managed to attract girls who aren't spirits to their ranks. However, fate and Souko Hino, Souichiro's mother, have other plans.

Souko chooses not to warn them when they take on a video game that is a portal to hell. She even farms them out to sold a haunting of a historic mansion. Meanwhile, those portals at Seika Academy keep popping up ready to suck unsuspecting students inside to be eaten by demons. And then, there is the talking mouse with magical powers! Will the adventures ever end so they can have a normal school day?

Chapter Eight - Ten & Special Teardrop.

Ryuuichi is back from his trip to the east, but he seems under the weather. He's moody and introverted, very unlike the glamorous Ryuuichi we know and love. It's almost like his personality is flipped. While that's happening, a string of murders are turning the streets of London red. Will Ryuuichi be able to escape his slump and capture this menace or will we find out something about Ryuuichi that we can never come back from?

Contents

  • The Two-Faced Jack
  • The Queen Who fell in Love
  • The Last King

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
LES ZOMBIES COLONISENT LE MONDE ET RIEN EN SEMBLE POUVOIR LES ARRÊTER.

À l'ouest des États-Unis, des millions de zombies s'entassent aux abords de l'île colonisée par les survivants de la caravane de bateaux. Ce qui aurait dû être un paradis se transforme en enfer, mais la communauté menée par Serge LaPointe, l'ancien acteur de films d'horreur, n'abandonne pas.

À l'est, un nouveau quotidien sans morts-vivants se dessine. Un petit génie de Boston, Clay Harris, a trouvé le moyen de chasser les zombies et s'il y a du monde à sauver, même à l'autre bout du pays, c'est son affaire ! Entre Kerouac et Oppenheimer, il compte bien remettre le rêve américain sur les rails.
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Précis de décomposition

Gen and Hikari find themselves in another series of adventures in volume three of Moonlight Kreuz. Gen's stepmother, Misono, is missing and Gen has more questions than answers. What is the real relationship between Misono and his mother, Sayoko? And how are they connected to the Wolf Association? Complicating the whole issue is Claude's meddling and his interest in everyone's business. What is his purpose? And why has Hikari suddenly gone crazy?! Read and find out as everything comes to an exciting conclusion in the final volume!

Chapter 13 - 16.

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
Kitamuras Kindergartenfreundin Ami ist Taiga ein Dorn im Auge (um nicht zu sagen ein Ast). Hinter ihrer süßen Modelfassade verbirgt sich ein ganz mieser Charakter. Und Ryuji muss darunter leiden! Denn Kitamura hat Taiga gebeten, sich mit Ami anzufreunden und sie kann ihrem Schwarm doch nichts ausschlagen! Also muss Ryuji als Puffer (oder Sandsack) zwischen den beiden Hitzköpfen herhalten und gleichzeitig irgendwie Minori näherkommen.

Das klingt nach Ärger!

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description:
AGENCE ASPIC : DES ENQUÊTES MIRIFIQUES !

Pour leur première affaire en tant que détectives professionnels de la toute jeune Agence Aspic, Hugo Beyle et Flora Vernet n'ont rien trouvé d'autre qu'enquêter sur la disparition... d'un spectre.

Un premier dossier pas facile, mais les temps sont durs.

Le client Ours-espiègle, un Indien attaché au cirque de Lille, a signalé la récente disparition de son frère jumeau, mort il y a plusieurs années, mais avec qui il entretenait de solides relations extralucides. Préférant la difficulté à l'inaction ou la ruine, Flora et Hugo concluent leur premier contrat.

Mais où diable se cache un fantôme quand il ne donne plus de nouvelle ... ?

Comment débusquer un ectoplasme qui fait le mort ?!
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Deux ch'tis Indiens

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: USA, 1949... Kevin Yamagata, Amerikaner japanischer Herkunft, ist Schöpfer des Comic-Bestsellers »Billy Bat«. Hauptcharakter ist eine Fledermaus - der Comic ein Stil-Mix aus klassischen Disney- und Superheldencomics. Plötzlich erfährt Kevin, dass es die Fledermaus-Figur in Japan schon lange geben soll. Hat er »Billy Bat« gar nicht selbst erfunden? Auf der Suche nach einer Erklärung beginnt für den Comiczeichner das größte Abenteuer seines Lebens. Und nicht nur für ihn stellt sich alles bisher Dagewesene auf den Kopf - die Fledermaus scheint Macht über alle Mneschen in allen Zeiten zu haben.
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Band 3

2013-01-01|2013-12-30.description: Akira et ses camarades de classe reviennent d’un voyage scolaire en avion lorsqu’un incident se produit, des secousses, une illusion puis le trou noir… Ils se réveillent plus tard sur une île habitée par des espèces que l’on croyait éteintes depuis des milliers voire des millions d’années. La situation devient de plus en plus désespérée à tel point que certains de ses camarades de classe sont dévorés vivants par des bêtes sauvages, tandis que d’autres tuent en désespoir de cause. Maintenant, Akira et quelques camarades d’infortune qui se sont joints à lui vont tenter de survivre à ce qui paraît être un horrible cauchemar …
2013-01-01|2013-12-30.name: Tome 3
